title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 May 05 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Monday, 05 May 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Monday, May 5 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers a wide spectrum of news in both the U.S. and abroad, including the latest on the financial front. 

Obama supporters in San Diego, Cali. recently suggested that it's racist not to like Mexican food. 

Additionally, western states around California now fear further land grabs by the Obama administration. 

In geopolitical news, stocks opened lower on Wall Street today due to the continuing crisis in Ukraine and it's now known that both the CIA and the FBI are "advising" the Ukrainian government. 

Porter Stansberry, the founder of Stansberry & Associates Investment Research, joins today's show to discuss current opportunities in volatile financial markets and the upcoming investment conference in Dallas, of which Alex will be a featured speaker.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
